properties.areaDesc: Western Nevada Basin and Range including Pyramid Lake; Greater Reno-Carson City-Minden Area
properties.headline: Special Weather Statement issued January 9 at 9:50AM PST by NWS Reno NV
properties.description:
Snow showers are expected across western Nevada into the early
afternoon hours.

Areas from Reno to Pyramid Lake to Fernley to Lovelock and Fallon
have the best chance of seeing a quick light accumulation through
1 PM today. This includes Interstate 80 east of Reno to
Winnemucca, and Highway 50 east of Fernley to Fallon.
Accumulations will range from a dusting up to a quick half inch in
these areas. We can't rule out spots of near one inch snowfall.

Expect sudden changes in weather and road conditions into the
early afternoon. Check road status and traffic before heading out
and allow some extra time for travel.

NWSheadline: Snow Showers into the Early Afternoon
